resource: 1003149.vtc=true 1003149.1002622.description=Open door warning buzzer:The open door warning buzzer sounds to alert the driver that one or more of the doors or trunk is not fully closed (with the vehicle having reached a speed of 3 mph [5 km/h]). 1003149.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003149.description=Open door warning buzzer:The open door warning buzzer sounds to alert the driver that one or more of the doors or trunk is not fully closed (with the vehicle having reached a speed of 3 mph [5 km/h]).
